segment.source: Sync Trigger Events for UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Sync Trigger Events for UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Sync Trigger Events for UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Sync Trigger Events for UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Sync Trigger Events for UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Sync Trigger Events for UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1 lets you synchronize your application and Windows settings across all your domain-joined devices.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1 lets you synchronize your application and Windows settings across all your domain-joined devices.

segment.source: Sync trigger events define when the UE-V Agent synchronizes those settings with the settings storage location.
segment.target: Sync trigger events define when the UE-V Agent synchronizes those settings with the settings storage location.

segment.source: UE-V 2 introduces a new Sync Method called the SyncProvider.
segment.target: UE-V 2 introduces a new Sync Method called the SyncProvider.

segment.source: For more information about Sync Method configuration, see Sync Methods for UE-V 2.x.
segment.target: For more information about Sync Method configuration, see Sync Methods for UE-V 2.x.

segment.source: UE-V 2 Sync Trigger Events
segment.target: UE-V 2 Sync Trigger Events

segment.source: The following table explains the trigger events for classic applications and Windows settings.
segment.target: The following table explains the trigger events for classic applications and Windows settings.

segment.source: UE-V 2 Trigger Event
segment.target: UE-V 2 Trigger Event

segment.source: SyncMethod=SyncProvider
segment.target: SyncMethod=SyncProvider

segment.source: SyncMethod=None
segment.target: SyncMethod=None

segment.source: Windows Logon
segment.target: Windows Logon

segment.source: Application and Windows settings are imported to the local cache from the settings storage location.
segment.target: Application and Windows settings are imported to the local cache from the settings storage location.

segment.source: Asynchronous Windows settings are applied.
segment.target: Asynchronous Windows settings are applied.

segment.source: Synchronous Windows settings will be applied during the next Windows logon.
segment.target: Synchronous Windows settings will be applied during the next Windows logon.

segment.source: Application settings will be applied when the application starts.
segment.target: Application settings will be applied when the application starts.

segment.source: Application and Windows settings are read directly from the settings storage location.
segment.target: Application and Windows settings are read directly from the settings storage location.

segment.source: Asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings are applied.
segment.target: Asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings are applied.

segment.source: Application settings will be applied when the application starts.
segment.target: Application settings will be applied when the application starts.

segment.source: Windows Logoff
segment.target: Windows Logoff

segment.source: Store changes locally and cache and copy asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings to the settings storage location server, if available
segment.target: Store changes locally and cache and copy asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings to the settings storage location server, if available

segment.source: Store changes to asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings storage location
segment.target: Store changes to asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings storage location

segment.source: Windows Connect (RDP) / Unlock
segment.target: Windows Connect (RDP) / Unlock

segment.source: Synchronize any asynchronous Windows settings from settings storage location to local cache, if available.
segment.target: Synchronize any asynchronous Windows settings from settings storage location to local cache, if available.

segment.source: Apply cached Windows settings
segment.target: Apply cached Windows settings

segment.source: Download and apply asynchronous windows settings from settings storage location
segment.target: Download and apply asynchronous windows settings from settings storage location

segment.source: Windows Disconnect (RDP) / Lock
segment.target: Windows Disconnect (RDP) / Lock

segment.source: Store asynchronous Windows settings changes to the local cache.
segment.target: Store asynchronous Windows settings changes to the local cache.

segment.source: Synchronize any asynchronous Windows settings from the local cache to settings storage location, if available
segment.target: Synchronize any asynchronous Windows settings from the local cache to settings storage location, if available

segment.source: Store asynchronous Windows settings changes to the settings storage location
segment.target: Store asynchronous Windows settings changes to the settings storage location

segment.source: Application start
segment.target: Application start

segment.source: Apply application settings from local cache as the application starts
segment.target: Apply application settings from local cache as the application starts

segment.source: Apply application settings from settings storage location as the application starts
segment.target: Apply application settings from settings storage location as the application starts

segment.source: Application closes
segment.target: Application closes

segment.source: Store any application settings changes to the local cache and copy settings to settings storage location, if available
segment.target: Store any application settings changes to the local cache and copy settings to settings storage location, if available

segment.source: Store any application settings changes to settings storage location
segment.target: Store any application settings changes to settings storage location

segment.source: Sync Controller Scheduled Task or “Sync Now” is run from the Company Settings Center
segment.target: Sync Controller Scheduled Task or “Sync Now” is run from the Company Settings Center

segment.source: Application and Windows settings are synchronized between the settings storage location and the local cache.
segment.target: Application and Windows settings are synchronized between the settings storage location and the local cache.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Settings changes are not cached locally until an application closes.
segment.target: Settings changes are not cached locally until an application closes.

segment.source: This trigger will not export changes made to a currently running application.
segment.target: This trigger will not export changes made to a currently running application.

segment.source: For Windows settings, this means that any changes will not be cached locally and exported until the next Lock (Asynchronous) or Logoff (Asynchronous and Synchronous).
segment.target: For Windows settings, this means that any changes will not be cached locally and exported until the next Lock (Asynchronous) or Logoff (Asynchronous and Synchronous).

segment.source: Settings are applied in these cases:
segment.target: Settings are applied in these cases:

segment.source: Asynchronous Windows settings are applied directly.
segment.target: Asynchronous Windows settings are applied directly.

segment.source: Application settings are applied when the application starts.
segment.target: Application settings are applied when the application starts.

segment.source: Both asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings are applied during the next Windows logon.
segment.target: Both asynchronous and synchronous Windows settings are applied during the next Windows logon.

segment.source: Windows app (AppX) settings are applied during the next refresh.
segment.target: Windows app (AppX) settings are applied during the next refresh.

segment.source: See Monitor Application Settings for more information.
segment.target: See Monitor Application Settings for more information.

segment.source: NA
segment.target: NA

segment.source: Asynchronous Settings updated on remote store*
segment.target: Asynchronous Settings updated on remote store*

segment.source: Load and apply new asynchronous settings from the cache.
segment.target: Load and apply new asynchronous settings from the cache.

segment.source: Load and apply settings from central server
segment.target: Load and apply settings from central server

segment.source: Got a suggestion for UE-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for UE-V?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.target: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
